member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.CloseBox
member.summary: Affects the close button, system menu item and keyboard shortcut.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.HighContrast
member.summary: Same as SystemInformation.HighContrast, but cached if handle is created.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.Moving
member.summary: If true, the window is being moved with the mouse.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.NormalBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds in restored state, which is not a snap layout, when window is minimized or maximized.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.RestoreToMaximized
member.summary: Gets the state of a window before being either minimized. Relevant only when window is minimized.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.Sizing
member.summary: If true, the window is being resized with the mouse.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.WindowMetrics
member.summary: Gets system metrics of the window. Cached if handle is created.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.CustomForm.WindowStyles
member.summary: Gets window styles. Cached if handle is created.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.CustomForm.DragMove
member.summary: Allows a form to be dragged by a mouse with it's left button down.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.CustomForm.SetFrameStyleCore(RemasterForms.FormFrameStyle,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)
member.param: Specifies the client bounds to restore in screen coordinates.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.CustomForm.UpdateMaximizedBounds
member.summary: Updates bounds when the window is maximized.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.DwmFrame.ClientInsets
member.summary: Extends the DWM frame into the client area.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.DwmFrame.CornerStyle
member.summary: Sets the rounded corner preference for a window. Supported starting with Windows 11 Build 22000.

member.name: P:RemasterForms.DwmFrame.DarkMode
member.summary: Allows the window frame for to be drawn in dark mode colors. Supported starting with Windows 10 Build 17763.

member.name: F:RemasterForms.NativeMethods.WINDOWPOS.x
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the new window. If the window is a child window, coordinates are relative to the parent window. Otherwise, the coordinates are relative to the screen origin.

member.name: F:RemasterForms.NativeMethods.WINDOWPOS.y
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the new window. If the window is a child window, coordinates are relative to the parent window. Otherwise, the coordinates are relative to the screen origin.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.WindowMenu.Show(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays the menu at the specified location in screen coordinates.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.WindowMenu.Show(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Displays the menu at the specified location in client coordinates.

member.name: M:RemasterForms.WindowMenu.Show
member.summary: Displays the menu at the system default location.
